name: Boots of Elusion
description: Boots that allow the wearer to move with incredible speed and agility.

name: Sabatons of the Crusader
description: Heavy sabatons that enhance the wearer's combat prowess.

name: Slippers of the Mistwalker
description: Silent slippers that grant improved movement and stealth.

name: Boots of the Stormbringer
description: Boots infused with the power of storms, enhancing elemental abilities.

name: Sandals of Tranquility
description: Lightweight sandals that offer comfort and increased focus.
